H0.text: who died in the plane crash greys anatomy. Mark Sloan

H1.text: who died in the plane crash greys anatomy. Arizona Robbins

H2.text: who died in the plane crash greys anatomy. Cristina Yang

H3.text: who died in the plane crash greys anatomy. Lexie

A4.text: Mark is soon placed on life support due to the extensive internal injuries he sustained during the plane crash and, as determined by his will, the machines keeping him alive are turned off as he shows no signs of waking after 30 days.

A5.text: Lexie is pinned under debris. Despite Mark and Cristina's efforts to save her, Lexie realizes she has sustained a fatal injury, suffering from a hemothorax.
